name: Iron Sting

refinement_effect.refine_one: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
